snippet: The S.&P. 500 is up 8.8 percent this month. If that holds up, it would be the index’s strongest month since October 2011.
abstract: Stocks decline, but end October with biggest monthly rise in four years.
lead_paragraph: The S.&P. 500 is up 8.8 percent this month. If that holds up, it would be the index’s strongest month since October 2011.

headline.print_headline: S.&P.’s October Gain Hit a 4-Year Monthly High
headline.main: Modest Loss for the Market as Month Comes to an End
